title: 'They were ready to go nuclear,' says Donald Trump: Claims again that he solved India-Pak issue
content: Donald Trump claimed to have brokered peace between India and Pakistan ahead of his Alaska summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin. "Six or seven planes came down. They were ready to go. Maybe nuclear. We solved that," Trump said about the India-Pakistan tension. Air Chief Marshal Staff Amar Preet Singh recently said India shot down five Pakistani fighter jets and one other large aircraft during Operation Sindoor. Pakistan rejected the claim.

title: Trump sees 'dead economy' - but US-based S&P Global upgrades India's credit rating; here's why
content: S&P Global upgraded India's rating to 'BBB' citing buoyant economic growth and enhanced monetary policy. Despite US tariffs, India's economy remains resilient due to domestic consumption and manageable impact on exports. The upgrade reflects India's strong recovery from the pandemic, infrastructure investments, and stable inflation, supporting long-term growth prospects.

title: J&K statehood plea: SC seeks Centre‚Äôs reply, says 'can‚Äôt ignore Pahalgam incident'

However, the court acknowledged the prevailing ground situation, citing the Pahalgam terror attack. The Centre's assurance of restoring statehood 'at the earliest' was recalled, while the court recognized that assembly elections have been conducted.

title: SIR row: Supreme Court asks EC to publish 65L deleted names with reasons

title: GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke: Won‚Äôt allow employees to refuse using GitHub

Under his leadership, GitHub experienced significant growth, particularly with AI-powered development tools like GitHub Copilot. However, Dohmke has recently resigned to pursue entrepreneurial ventures, leading to GitHub's integration into Microsoft's CoreAI team by the end of 2025.

title: Independence Day: 5 Shaurya Chakras for war on terror & Naxals

title: 85+ Happy Independence Day messages, greetings, wishes and quotes for 2025

It encourages remembering the past and dreaming of tomorrow. Jai Hind

He points out dependence on China for essential goods. Chinese regulators question Nvidia chip purchases. They are pushing for domestic alternatives. Nvidia denies security risks. title: Bengali migrants illegally held, says West Bengal: Supreme Court seeks response of 8 states
content: The Supreme Court has requested responses from eight states, including UP and Maharashtra, regarding the alleged unauthorized detention of Muslim migrant workers from West Bengal. The West Bengal Migrant Workers Welfare Board claims these detentions are based on mere suspicion of being Bangladeshi nationals.

title: Sandwich assault arrest: DOJ worker fired after allegedly attacking CBP agent in DC - Video
content: A Department of Justice employee, Sean Charles Dunn, was fired after allegedly assaulting a Customs and Border Protection agent with a Subway sandwich in Washington D.C. The incident occurred on Sunday night, where Dunn reportedly shouted at federal officers, calling them "fascists," before throwing the sandwich.

title: 'Thought he‚Äôd just be a hometown hero': LeBron James' wife recalled her early expectations
content: LeBron James and his wife Savannah's enduring love story, which began in their teens, continues to inspire. Savannah revealed she never envisioned LeBron's monumental NBA success, initially seeing him as a local hero. Despite his fame and fortune, LeBron remains devoted to his family, crediting Savannah for his achievements.

title: LeBron James‚Äô wife says their love story could‚Äôve ended without his crucial career move
content: Savannah James, wife of NBA star LeBron James, revealed in a podcast episode that their relationship might not have survived if LeBron hadn't been drafted by the Cleveland Cavaliers. She expressed uncertainty about their future had he not stayed close to home. Despite early challenges, including a teenage pregnancy, the couple persevered and married in 2013.

title: Dwyane Wade's wife shares perimenopause struggle, emotional toll as a Black woman
content: Gabrielle Union openly discussed her experiences with perimenopause, including hair loss, mood changes, and anxiety, impacting her mental health. She highlighted the challenges and feelings of isolation during this phase. With Dwyane Wade's support, the couple navigated these difficulties, and Union is now embracing a happy phase of her life while raising their daughter, Kaavia.

title: Olympic Gold Medalist Chloe Kim shows up at boyfriend Myles Garrett‚Äôs Browns practice
content: Despite a recent speeding incident where Myles Garrett was fined, his girlfriend, Chloe Kim, showed unwavering support by attending his practice. The couple's affection was evident as they were visibly captivated by each other during interviews and red-carpet photos. Their relationship, which began three months ago, continues to flourish amidst Garrett's NFL preseason preparations.

title: Diabetes dietitian recommends four foods to lower blood sugar to non-diabetic level
content: Diabetes is a growing concern in the US, affecting millions. Experts Diana Licalzi & Jose Tejero suggest incorporating beans, broccoli, edamame, and berries into your diet. These foods are rich in fiber, protein, and compounds that improve insulin sensitivity and help manage blood sugar levels, potentially aiding in diabetes reversal.

title: Broccoli botulism outbreak: Woman describes how she survived from deadly snack that killed 2 others
content: A botulism outbreak traced to a food truck in southern Italy has resulted in two deaths and multiple hospitalizations. The contaminated sandwiches, containing sausage and turnip tops, were linked to the illness.

title: Champion bodybuilder Hayley McNeff dies at 37, Massachusetts community mourns sudden loss
content: Champion bodybuilder Hayley McNeff, originally from Concord, Massachusetts, passed away unexpectedly on August 8, 2025. Known for her vibrant personality and achievements in equestrian, diving, and skiing, she later excelled in bodybuilding, securing state titles and appearing in a documentary. After retiring from competition, McNeff pursued graduate studies in psychology.

title: PPI spike: US producer prices inflation hit 3-year high in July
content: US producer price inflation soared in July, reaching its highest level since 2022, fueled by rising service and goods costs. Economists suggest that President Trump's tariffs are contributing to increased business expenses, particularly in sectors like steel, aluminum and food products.

title: 8 Genius hotel booking hacks every traveller needs to know
content: Finding the perfect hotel can significantly impact your travel experience. To simplify the process, define your priorities, book early for better deals, and carefully read guest reviews. Explore alternative stays, contact hotels directly for inquiries, and leverage loyalty programs for exclusive benefits. Secure payments and keep records to ensure a smooth and enjoyable trip.

title: Op Sindoor: Experts back IAF claim of 5 Pak jets downed; hail 300km S-400 hit
content: International analysts corroborate Air Chief Marshal Amar Preet Singh's claims regarding Operation Sindoor, confirming the IAF's downing of multiple Pakistani jets, including a Saab 2000 early warning aircraft. Expert Tom Cooper highlights the S-400 missile system's successful strike at 300 km, a potential world record.

title: 92 all out! Ex-Pak cricketer slams Mike Hesson ‚Äî 'I don‚Äôt know what qualities‚Ä¶'
content: Shoaib Akhtar has criticized Mike Hesson's appointment as Pakistan's head coach after their dismal batting performance against West Indies. Akhtar questioned Hesson's ODI credentials and blamed poor policies for exposing players on seaming tracks. He also urged Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan to take more responsibility in finishing games, emphasizing the need for acceleration after reaching a half-century.

title: 8-0 in ODI WC, 7-1 in T20 WC ‚Äî But what's India's record vs Pakistan in Asia Cup?
content: India dominated Pakistan in both ICC World Cups and Asia Cups, holding a significant lead in head-to-head records. Out of 18 Asia Cup clashes, India has won 10 compared to Pakistan's 6, securing eight titles against Pakistan's two. This year's Asia Cup, hosted in the UAE, will feature another high-stakes encounter between the two rivals.

title: 'Painful consequences': India warns Pak to 'temper rhetoric'; 'hiding own failures'
content: India's Ministry of External Affairs has strongly condemned Pakistan's escalating anti-India rhetoric, warning of severe repercussions for any miscalculated actions. This response follows inflammatory statements by Pakistan's army chief, Asim Munir, including threats against India's Jamnagar refinery. India has voiced concerns regarding the absence of civilian control over Pakistan's nuclear decisions, highlighting the military's collaboration with terrorist groups.

title: Gracie Hunt vs Taylor Swift: Fiery reaction to ‚ÄòShowgirl‚Äô look
content: Gracie Hunt, daughter of the Kansas City Chiefs owner, ignited social media with her enthusiastic reaction to Taylor Swift's new album cover, 'The Life of a Showgirl.' The album, set for an October 2025 release, promises a bold, glamorous shift in Swift's musical journey, featuring collaborations with Max Martin, Shellback, and Sabrina Carpenter.

title: Russia-US talks: Were tariffs on India a way to get Putin to come to the table?
content: Donald Trump suggested that secondary tariffs on India, impacting Russian oil sales, might have influenced Vladimir Putin's decision to meet him in Alaska. Trump aims for a quick peace deal in Ukraine, potentially involving Volodymyr Zelenskyy in future talks. Increased tariffs on Indian imports have drawn strong objections, highlighting the complex global dynamics surrounding the US-Russia relationship.

title: Alaska red flag for India as Trump heads out for Putin meeting
content: Amidst US-Russia tensions, India faces potential repercussions for its oil purchases from Moscow, hinted at by Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent. While elite Indian Air Force pilots participated in US-led Red Flag exercises in Alaska, Washington considers sanctions or tariffs on New Delhi if it fails to sway Moscow.

title: 46 dead, 100-odd injured, many missing as cloudburst wipes out pilgrims' camp in J&K's Kishtwar
content: A devastating cloudburst in Kishtwar, J&K, struck a pilgrimage pit stop at Chishoti, resulting in at least 46 fatalities, primarily among Shri Machail Mata Yatra pilgrims. Over 100 individuals sustained injuries, and numerous others remain missing. Rescue operations, involving the Army, police, and NDRF, have saved approximately 160 people.

title: Sehwag reveals Sachin stopped him from retirement: 'Don't make emotional decisions'
content: Virender Sehwag considered retiring from ODIs in 2007-08 after being dropped, but Sachin Tendulkar advised him to reconsider, drawing from his own experience. Sehwag heeded the advice, returned to form, and played a vital role in India's 2011 World Cup victory. He also shared his thoughts on his son Aryaveer's cricket career, emphasizing the importance of handling pressure.

title: '25% chance ‚Ä¶': Trump teases outcome of talks with Putin; hints at bigger showdown
content: Donald Trump envisions a three-way summit with Vladimir Putin and Volodymyr Zelenskyy to finalize a Ukraine peace deal, following his Alaska meeting with Putin on August 15. Trump acknowledged a 25% chance of the Alaska summit being unsuccessful, emphasizing its role in setting the stage for future negotiations.

title: Vece Paes borrowed Olympic medal from Dhyan Chand‚Äôs son after losing his; but final wish went unmet
content: Dr. Vece Paes, the Olympic bronze medalist in hockey, passed away, leaving behind a legacy of sportsmanship and dedication. Despite battling Parkinson's in his later years, he sought to recreate his lost Olympic medal, even borrowing one from a former teammate.

title: Tree fall, wall collapse: Delhi rain havoc claims 3 lives in 12 hours
content: Heavy rains in Delhi caused havoc, resulting in three deaths within 12 hours. Two boys died in Vasant Vihar after a wall collapsed, while a man was killed in Kalkaji when a tree fell on his motorcycle. AAP leader Atishi demanded the resignation of PWD Minister Parvesh Verma, blaming the BJP government for inadequate monsoon preparations and rising rain-related fatalities.

title: Woman discovers 2.3-carat diamond at state park, plans to make it her engagement ring
content: Micherre Fox spent three weeks at Arkansas' Crater of Diamonds State Park, determined to find a diamond for her engagement ring. On her final day, she unearthed a 2.3-carat white diamond, one of the largest found this year. Fox named it the Fox-Ballou Diamond, symbolizing hard work and perseverance in marriage.

title: Friend's party turns horror: Delhi woman's drink spiked, gang-raped, blackmailed with video
content: A 24-year-old woman from Delhi's Tilak Nagar has reported being allegedly raped by a group, including a woman, after attending a party in Civil Lines. She claims she was drugged, assaulted, and filmed, with threats made to release the video if she spoke out.

title: Rohit Sharma back on the field, gears up for ODI comeback - WATCH
content: Rohit Sharma is intensely training for an ODI comeback, aiming to play until the 2027 World Cup. A video shows him in excellent form, coinciding with his rise to No. 2 in the ICC ODI batting rankings. Sharma and Kohli, committed to the 50-over format, may return in the October series against Australia.

title: After injury vs India, England pacer gives a big update ahead of Ashes
content: England's Chris Woakes is optimistic about his Ashes participation after a dislocated shoulder sustained during the India Test. His rehabilitation is progressing well, allowing him to move his arm without a sling. Woakes aims to strengthen his shoulder through rehab, hoping to avoid surgery and be fit for the series against Australia starting in November.

title: 'People don't understand ...': India pacer weighs in on Bumrah's workload call
content: Bhuvneshwar Kumar defended the decision to manage Jasprit Bumrah's workload, emphasising the physical and mental toll of playing all formats. Kumar highlighted Bumrah's significant impact even in a limited number of matches, citing his crucial contribution of 14 wickets in three Tests against England. He also noted Bumrah's increased confidence and maturity gained through years of consistent performance.

title: Top 5 ent news: Dhanush reviews Coolie; Shilpa Shetty-Raj Kundra booked in fraud case
content: Dhanush reviewed Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' with Aishwaryaa, while Varun Badola suggested Shah Rukh Khan couldn't save 'Saiyaara'. Shilpa Shirodkar's car was hit by a bus, and Shilpa Shetty and Raj Kundra face fraud allegations. Nikhil Dwivedi criticized Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai starrer 'Raavan' for its flawed storytelling and wasted potential, despite its visual appeal.

title: 'Resolve to buy Indian products': Prez Murmu's message to nation amid Trump's tariffs
content: President Droupadi Murmu addressed the nation on the eve of the 79th Independence Day, highlighting India's journey towards self-reliance and confident progress. She emphasized the importance of democracy, the Constitution, and remembering the pain of partition. Murmu also underscored the core values of justice, liberty, equality, and fraternity, while noting the government's efforts to improve urban infrastructure.

title: 'Things are different now': India pacer on how Virat Kohli has changed over the years
content: Bhuvneshwar Kumar reflects on his evolving relationship with Virat Kohli, noting a shift from playful banter to discussions about family and life beyond cricket. Despite their off-field camaraderie, professionalism drives their performance on the field. Bhuvneshwar also praised Rajat Patidar's leadership and RCB's balanced team effort in securing their historic IPL 2025 victory.

title: Shedeur Sanders connects with referee that officiated collegiate debut
content: shedeur Sanders hasn't moved up on the Browns' depth chart . he played for the Jackson State Tigers in the Denny's Orange Blossom Classic . the rookie quarterback threw for 221 yards and completed 18 of 24 passes .

title: 'Write a check!': Why Terry McLaurin, Commanders can't get a deal done
content: wide receiver Terry McLaurin bounded out of the team's facility two weeks ago . he entered the final season of a three-year deal he signed in 2022 . his mood mirrored what the commanders have insisted about him .

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .

title: Lurking concerns for top 10 NBA contenders for the 2025-26 season
content: the NBA Finals are 10 months away, but it's never too early to recognize potential roster holes or franchise concerns . our insiders break down the biggest under-the-radar concerns for 10 teams with the best odds to win the title . the Oklahoma City Thunder won the Larry O'Brien Trophy this year .

title: Expert picks, best bets for UFC 319 and PFL championships
content: the title fight will take place at the UFC 319 on august 19 at 10 p.m. ET . the MMA championships continue from Charlotte, North Carolina, on friday . du Plessis is a perfect 9-0 with six early stoppages and Chimaev 8-0 .

title: MLB Awards Watch: August update on MVP, CY Young and more
content: this month's awards watch reflects changes atop some races and separation in others . the two methods of tracking these things are in complete accord when it comes to anointing the current favorites . a lot can and will change in short period of time in a big league baseball season .

title: Pacquiao title shot -- again? Joshua vs. Jake Paul? Canelo on canvas? Don't be surprised
content: the first eight months of 2025 have been interesting, to say the least . the last four months of the year will be dominated by Terence Crawford's bid to become a three-division undisputed champion when he makes the incomprehensible climb of two weight classes to 168 pounds to challenge Canelo Alvarez on sept. 13 .

title: Augusta National ditches the masses in a quest for higher revenues
content: the 2026 "Official Masters Hospitality" program includes offers of housing, transportation, catering and so on to the corporate and/or well-heeled . the "Full Scale, Private Home Program," which will run you a mere $219,600 for the week, comes days after the announcement that a local Hooters restaurant is closing .

title: The NFL's guide to supporting a rookie QB: Build a foundation and make him compete
content: new coach Dan Quinn wanted to make sure the situation was right . Quinn spent time analyzing what he'd do differently the next time . he hadn't built his coaching staff to withstand success . the team went to the super bowl in the 2016 season .
